title: Non-stop FPS drops in game since last patch/windows update?
body: Heya guys! Ever since a patch ago(or a windows update ago) I've been suffering massive FPS dips that occur more and more as the game goes on. I usually get between 200 and 260 fps, but now it's around 130 and it drops to 40-0 constantly. Especially when the action heats up. I used to maintain 200-260 no matter how dicey things got in game. I've tried everything I've found online from using REGedit to disable game mode to messing with windows settings. Can I get perhaps a Red to help me out here? I can't play ranked anymore! Q_Q{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
If you're on Windows 10, there are a number of issues that the *Game DVR* feature has been causing. I recommend disabling the Game Bar entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves your issue.

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rt88fkvr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-13T02:11:55.958+0000)
>
> If you're on Windows 10, there are a number of issues that the *Game DVR* feature has been causing. I recommend disabling the Game Bar entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves your issue.
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

Thank you for the response! _Edit_: Ok I managed to disable it through the normal method, but it's still causing the same fps drops and nothing has changed.
 
I've written a support ticket, but I know that could take time to respond to and was hoping to do some sleuthing on it. Any other ideas what I can do to make sure the game mode thing isn't still affecting it?

Since you've already submitted a support ticket with system logs, I suggest sitting tight while a tech team member gets back to you. They'll have far more context with the logs you've provided on what could be causing this issue directly.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
